## ColorLAB.toObject() method

Returns the [ColorLAB](./fast-colors.colorlab.md) formatted as an object.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toObject(): {
        l: number;
        a: number;
        b: number;
    };
```
<b>Returns:</b>

`{ l: number; a: number; b: number; }`
